DOC.brief_summary: The purpose is to evaluate,in 20 patients, if the sentinel node(s) in melanoma can be detected by lymph contrast ultrasound. In comparing the patients will also get lymph-scintigraphy and sentinel node detection wiht blue dye. The goal is to improve the method for detecting sentinel node(s) in melanoma.
DOC.brief_title: Sentinel Node With Ultrasound Contrast in Melanoma
DOC.criteria: Malignant melanoma on a extremity, No spread of the cancer, Patients over 18 years old, Pregnancy, Lactating, Severe hart disease,
